components/search/sidebar:
<nav class="haloCustomScrollbar">
    {{> components/halothemes/sidebar/halo-all-categories breadcrumbs=breadcrumbs}}

    {{#if product_results.faceted_search_enabled}}
        {{> components/faceted-search/index product_results}}
    {{else}}
        {{> components/category/shop-by-price}}
        {{#if shop_by_brand}}
            {{> components/halothemes/sidebar/halo-shop-by-brand}}
        {{/if}}
    {{/if}}

    {{#if theme_settings.halo-sidebar-products}}
        {{#if products.top_sellers}}
            {{> components/halothemes/sidebar/halo-product-sidebar products=products.top_sellers title=theme_settings.halo-sidebar-products-title}}
        {{else}}
            {{> components/halothemes/sidebar/halo-product-sidebar products=products.featured title=theme_settings.halo-sidebar-products-title}}
        {{/if}}
    {{/if}}
    
    {{> components/halothemes/sidebar/halo-advertisement-image}}
    {{> components/halothemes/sidebar/halo-advertisement-content}}
</nav>
components/faceted-search/index:
{{> components/faceted-search/selected-facets selected}} {{#if facets.length '>' 2}} {{lang 'search.faceted.browse-by'}} {{join (pluck facets 'title') ', ' limit=2}} & {{toLowerCase (lang 'search.faceted.more')}} {{else}} {{lang 'search.faceted.browse-by'}} {{join (pluck facets 'title') ', ' lastSeparator=' & '}} {{/if}} {{lang 'search.faceted.hide-filters'}} {{lang 'search.faceted.show-filters'}} {{#any facets visible=true}}
{{#each facets}} {{#if visible}} {{{dynamicComponent 'components/faceted-search/facets'}}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
{{/any}}
components/halothemes/sidebar/halo-shop-:
{{#if theme_settings.halo-sidebar-shop-by-brand}}

{{lang 'brands.heading'}}

    {{#each shop_by_brand}}
  • {{name}}
    • {{/each}}
{{lang 'common.view_all'}}
{{/if}}
components/halothemes/sidebar/halo-adver:
{{#if theme_settings.halo-sidebar-image}}
{{/if}}
components/halothemes/sidebar/halo-produ:
{{title}}

{{#each (limit products theme_settings.sidebar_products_per_page)}} {{> components/halothemes/sidebar/halo-product-sidebar-tmp theme_settings=../theme_settings}} {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/range-form: {{#if this.sort}} {{/if}}
components/halothemes/sidebar/halo-produ:
{{> components/common/responsive-img image=image class="card-image" fallback_size=theme_settings.product_sidebar_size lazyload=theme_settings.lazyload_mode default_image=theme_settings.default_image_product }}

{{#if theme_settings.halo_card_title '==' 'ellipsis'}} {{name}} {{else}} {{name}} {{/if}}

{{#or customer (unless settings.hide_price_from_guests)}} {{> components/products/price price=price}} {{else}} {{> components/common/login-for-pricing}} {{/or}}
{{#if theme_settings.haloAddOptionForProduct}}
{{/if}} {{lang 'products.details_link'}}
components/faceted-search/facets/hierarc:
{{#each this}}
  • {{{sanitize title}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} {{#if count}} ({{count}}) {{/if}} {{/if}} {{#if children}} {{> components/faceted-search/facets/hierarchy-children children}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/selected-facet:
{{lang 'search.faceted.selected.title'}}

{{#if items}}
    {{#each items}}
  • {{#if facet '===' 'rating'}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.rating-label' rating=title}} {{else}} {{{sanitize title}}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{else}}

{{lang 'search.faceted.selected.no-filters'}}

{{/if}} {{#if remove_all_url}} {{lang 'search.faceted.selected.clear-all'}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/range:
{{> components/faceted-search/faceted-search-navigation}}
{{> components/faceted-search/range-form}}
components/faceted-search/facets/multi:
{{#if items}}
{{> components/faceted-search/faceted-search-navigation}}
    {{#each items}}
  • {{{sanitize title}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} ({{count}}) {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{#if show_more_toggle}}
{{lang 'search.faceted.show-more'}}
{{/if}} {{#if selected}}
{{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}}
{{/if}}
{{/if}}
components/common/responsive-img: {{!-- This file implements the lazysizes srcset pattern (as seen on https://github.com/aFarkas/lazysizes#modern-transparent-srcset-pattern) for maximum performance on modern browsers and reasonable compatibility with legacy browsers. There are a few important arguments to know about when using this component: `lazyload`: - If set to 'lazyload+lqip', will load a low-res image which will be replaced by lazysizes - ensuring that SOME content is shown immediately on page load. Without LQIP, a transparent gif will be used instead, which reduces the number of requests needed to load the page, making it even faster. - If set to 'lazyload', the browser will not load the full-size image at first, instead the lazysizes plugin will load it progressively after page load. This improves the load speed of the page, but it should be disabled for high-priority above-the-fold images. - If set to 'disabled', will not attempt to lazyload the image and instead tell the browser to load it immediately. Use this for high-priority images that are above the fold. `fallback_size`: This is the size to use for this image in legacy browsers that do not support srcset. Can be defined as a pixel bounding-box size (e.g. "123x123) or inherent width (e.g. "123w"). `class`: The CSS classes to add to the image, e.g. "card-image". If lazyloading is enabled, all images will have the "lazyload" class so that lazysizes will target them automatically. `otherAttributes`: Any other HTML attributes you want on the img tag, for example "height='100' width='100'" `default_image`: The default image to use if `image` is undefined or falsy. Should be a theme asset, usually defined as a relative path in the theme config. If a default image is not provided, you'll get an image tag with no image if the primary image is undefined. `lqip_size`: If you want to specify a particular size for the LQIP image, you can do so with this argument. A default of 80 pixels wide will be used otherwise. This argument has no effect if the lazyload mode is not "lazyload+lqip". --}}
components/products/ratings: {{#for 1 5}} {{#if ../this.rating '>=' $index}} {{else}} {{/if}} {{/for}}
